is beautiful isolated village in the foothills of Himalayas, about 18 miles north-east of
It is only 30 to 40 min drive by car from the capital

towards Murree. There is a single concrete road in fairly good condition. Local transport like buses are also available but it's better to travel by your own car. You have to park your car at the entrance of the village because only a small cemented road goes into Angoori, but the village is small enough to cover on foot.
Easily covered by foot. You can hike on the beautiful mountains. Forests are pretty safe.
can be seen easily, especially at night. Here you can enjoy the beauty of the nature, with the long pine trees and lush green fields.

In Angoori you can eat natural and healthy food such as plain yogurt, lassi, home made fresh butter, vegetables and Mustard green cooked in clay pot over the wood fire. A taste you would never forget.
Drink fresh and pure cow's milk and refreshing butter milk (lassi).

Unfortunately there is no hotel accommodation available till now.
 
You can easily reach Islamabad as well as Murree from here within 30 minutes. 
Here you can also find vivid picture of nature.
